title: Yelling Out Loud
description: Ellory Graham has never been the type of girl who breaks easily.Especially over a guy.But Adam Jacobs isn't just any guy. He's dark, beautiful, seems to love Ellory, and has a secret that only she knows about.If you love someone, you should be with them right? At least that's what Ellory thinks after ending up in the psych ward following a tragic end to her senior homecoming. She's been in the ward for months and Adam hasn't contacted her once. In fact, Adam has seemed to disappear. Now, Ellory has dropped her guard and she finds herself doing something she never thought she would, falling a part.Adam's neglect of her haunts her. And in the end she has to ask herself two questions; Where is he? And what could he be doing?
author: Lauren Hammond
